rows.label: qst610504_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh yes, I was watching you all
strolling your way over here.
Took your sweet time, didn't ye?

rows.label: qst610504_msg0003
rows.name:
I've got good eyes, me. There's
precious little I cannae spy.

rows.label: qst610504_msg0004
rows.name:
But out here, there's
precious little worth
keeping a spying eye out for.

rows.label: qst610504_msg0005
rows.name:
Nobody lives here, so there's
nobody to kick up trouble.

rows.label: qst610504_msg0006
rows.name:
All we get is a few monsters now and
then. They're fiercer than the ones
back home, I'll give 'em that, but...

rows.label: qst610504_msg0007
rows.name:
Well, it's just a bit of
a bore. Feels like my
skills are going to waste.

rows.label: qst610504_msg0008
rows.name: Tell ye what, here's an idea.

rows.label: qst610504_msg0009
rows.name:
You lot are pretty handy
fighters, aren't ye?

rows.label: qst610504_msg0010
rows.name:
I couldn't beat you in battle, but we'll
see if you can beat me at my own job.
Let's have us a lookout contest!

rows.label: qst610504_msg0101
rows.name:
Here's what we'll do. You keep watch
from that station right there.

rows.label: qst610504_msg0102
rows.name:
I couldn't see anything amiss, but
we'll see if you can do better.

rows.label: qst610504_msg0103
rows.name:
If you spot anything, be it monsters
on the prowl or soldiers misbehaving,
you just let me know!

rows.label: qst610504_msg0201
rows.name: I'll back you up from here.

rows.label: qst610504_msg0202
rows.name:
You lot head down to the Divine Beast
weapon over yonder, taking out any
Invidians that get in your way!

rows.label: qst610504_msg0203
rows.name:
It looks like they're no slouches in
battle... Might be a bit much for our
non-Driver soldiers to handle.
